Final thesis developed as part of the Bachelor in Computer Science at Universitat Politécnica de Valéncia. 

## Summary
The aim of the project was developing a ranking system for ASys. A platform developed for providing student different auto-correctable exercises to help them improving their learning process. 

We have develop a ranking and statistical dashboard for providing students with information regarding their progress and compete, motivating and encouraging to do more exercises. 

## Technology
The project was developed using Java programming language with the use of Spring framework. The platform client was developed using Vue JS, HTML and CSS. 

In addition other techonolgies such as MySQL and MinIO for storing data and resources has been used.
